name: sling (zzox)
description:
Simple Two-Button Game.  Can be played vs AI or Multiplayer Local.

Rules:

Hit: 3pts

Opponent Miss: 1pt

When both players collide on dash, the higher player wins.

Controls:

A: Navigate/Jump

S: Select/Dash

L: Player 2 Jump

K: Player 2 Dash

Assets:

Used a slightly altered version of Manaspace Font, as well as one tile from the Rock Rush Tileset.  All other assets created by zzox (tyler).  Made with Phaser 3.
